Enter the WiFi password, please make sure the WiFi password is correct.
1) Please enter your WiFi network name and password. \n\n2) Tap “Confirm” to confirm that the network name and password is accurate. \n\n3) Follow the instructions on the screen. To Know Your Weight follow the steps below : 1. With scale placed on sturdy, leveled and hard surface, step on the scale bare footed. 2. The digits displaying weight will blink three times, and a dotted line will show up three times, after that step down the scale. 3. Continue doing so several times a week. 1. Step on the scale and measure your weight 2. Scale start blinking and with your weight & stop 3. Step down from scale. Yes! it"'s" done Your configuration completed successfully. Please remove the batteries from the scale and put them back. Press and hold the Black button in the batteries compartment until you see \'AP\' next to the WiFi symbol. Release the button. Tap on AP Config below. Please double check your password and health of your Wi-Fi network, and try again. You have signed up successfully. For you to start using the service, please have the primary user to complete his/her registration process. Login Sign up Please tap on ‘Update’ button at the bottom on this page LoginNewActivity Message Board Add Friend
⋮ SELECT TIME SELECT DATE Set Reminder ENTER TITLE View History Frequent messaging with your accountability circle members is a good idea Please enter your desired weight and time
Please choose one of the options, “Accept SureFiz Weight” or “I Will Provide Weight and Time” I Will Provide Weight & Time Accept SureFiz Weight Time To Lose Weight Time To Lose Weight Will Be Calculated After The First Weight
Sign up is complete. Your free scale will arrive within 2 to 5 business days of your purchase from Amazon. When you receive your scale, login into the SureFiz mobile App, with email ID and password created during this signup. Sign up is complete. Log into the SureFiz mobile App, with email ID and password created during this signup. As a security measure, newer versions of Android have added an additional step to connect to WiFi. Therefore next, you will see a popup with temporary WiFi of your scale named, please select this network to connect. Scale ID From Amazon "This Facebook Account has been already linked with another SureFiz account. Please try with someother." "This Google Account has been already linked with another SureFiz account. Please try with someother." "Please note, should you choose this option, you will need to provide your desired weight and the time to lose that weight. Would you like to proceed with “I Will Provide Weight & Time”?" From SureFiz Website Haven\'t Bought Yet, Need to Buy Didn\'t Buy, Received as a Gift Changing these parameters will reassign your sub goals. Current data on your charts will reset. Are you sure you want to proceed? This notification is expired and cannot be used now because the scale is turned off and is no more broadcasting your weight.
On your WiFi router, do you have two WiFi or only one WiFi? Generally, routers have two separate WiFi, one is 2.4 GHz WiFi and the other is 5 GHz WiFi.
Please make sure your phone is connected to your WiFi. Install the batteries into the scale (If batteries are already installed, take them out and reinstall) and push the black button in the batteries compartment until you see the letters \'AP\' next to flashing WiFi symbol on the scale screen. Please make sure your phone is connected to your 2.4 GHz WiFi, Install the batteries into the scale, A WiFi Symbol will start flashing on scale screen (If the batteries are already installed, remove them and reinstall and if the WiFi symbol is not flashing on the scale screen, push and hold the black button until you see flashing WiFi symbol. If you see letters \'AP\' next to flashing WiFi, you went too far.

//***************Alerts***********************************************************************
Please enter your First Name. Please enter your Last Name. Please enter your Email ID. Please re-enter your Email ID. Please check your email entry. The entered emails are not matching. Please create a new Password. Please select your Pre Existing Conditions. Please select your Lifestyle. Please enter your Phone Number. Please select your Preferred Units. Please select Weight Management Goal. Please select how to determine your desired weight. Please select your Desired Weight. Please select your Time To Lose Weight. Please select your Height. Please select your Gender. Please enter your Age. Your age should be greater than 6. Please select your Country. Please enter your Address Line 1. Please enter your City. Please select your State. Please enter your Zip Code. Please choose, how did you learn about SureFiz. Please accept Terms and Conditions. Please enter your password. Password must be minimum 8 characters.
Please confirm your password. New password and confirm password must be same. Scale ID must contain 10 digits. Scale ID and Confirm Scale ID mismatched. Please confirm your Scale ID. If you have received your scale, please enter or scan your scale ID. If you have not received your scale yet, please wait and login again when you have your scale.
